intro: Discover the legend of Saint George or rewrite history!
description:
Delve into the myth of Saint George and the Dragon in a unique interactive experience.
In Legends: Saint George, your decisions will determine the fate of the legendary knight and that distant kingdom.
Will you save the princess? Will you defeat the dragon? Or will you cross paths with legendary characters such as Don Quijote or Joan of Arc and join forces with them?

Key features:
Branching storyline: multiple choices leading to different endings.
Inspired by the legend of Saint George, with unique reinterpretations.
Unexpected encounters: legendary characters from different cultures.
Carefully crafted visuals that bring heroes and settings to life.
Ideal for all ages: a fun way to bring great myths to young and old alike.
Part of the “Legends: Folklore Stories” collection: the first adventures in a series dedicated to popular legends from around the world.
From the creators of Die by Anything and Kittengumi comes this new interactive adventure that reimagines classic stories with the unique style of Guarida Games.
